activities: DRRT receives information from institutional investors from Europe, which may or may not include also personal information, including name, position and contact details of persons transmitting investment information by institutional investors.  Information is stored in the internal database of DRRT and only used in connection with the services offered to DRRT clients as outlined in the DRRT Service Contract. Any personal information, including names and titles, indicated on affidavits or powers of attorneys used by DRRT and communicated to persons outside of DRRT is used with the knowledge and consent of the person whose information is reflected in such documents.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Denmark, France, Germany, Greece, Ireland, Italy, Liechtenstein, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: off-line, on-line, and manually processed data
recoursemech: EU data protection authorities (DPAs) and Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC)
